title: AE脚本-空物体连线动画脚本 Paths From Nulls
author: 大众脸
content: 该脚本是 After Effects 内置工具 'Nulls From Paths.jsx' 的反向功能，可从现有的空物体生成路径（直线或曲线）。通过按住 Shift 键，可从任意选中的图层快速创建新路径。特别适用于处理追踪数据或从 3D 软件导入的空物体。生成的路径还可添加绳索效果，实现类似实时面条般的动态表现，为动画创作增添趣味性。

other.original_title: AE脚本-空物体连线动画脚本 Paths From Nulls
other.description_en: The alter ego entity of the built-in tool “Nulls From Paths.jsx” grants your fingertips the power to generate a path from existing nulls to achieve unique effects, especially when working with tracked footage/nulls imported from 3D software. If that wasn’t enough, a swift tick gifts the created paths with rope-like qualities so you can finally host your own realtime noodles party.
